[TARGETLANGUAGE]: English
[PROMPT]: "Generate a comprehensive list of free backlink opportunities including public forums, guest posting platforms, and directories. Include step-by-step guidelines for effectively adding backlinks, maintaining visibility, and optimizing their SEO impact."
